citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The licensee is missing a complete environmental enhancement plan for birds. They have an extensive written
enrichment program for all species, but it lacks some of the required components for the birds including: social grouping,
special considerations, and exemptions. Additionally, the plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. A species
appropriate plan for environmental enhancement is necessary to promote the psychological well-being of birds.
Correct by 10/27/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

The licensee is missing a complete environmental enhancement plan for birds. They have an extensive written 
enrichment program for all species, but it lacks some of the required components for the birds including: social grouping, 
special considerations, and exemptions. Additionally, the plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. A species 
appropriate plan for environmental enhancement is necessary to promote the psychological well-being of birds.  
Correct by 10/27/23.
